headline.main: Forest fires continue to burn and firefighters battle to contain them
headline.sub: Forest fires continue to burn and firefighters battle to contain them

docs.lead_paragraph: Forest and brush fires tear through parts of Chile forcing residents to evacuate as fire-fighters struggle to contain the blazes that started over the weekend. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
docs.snippet: Forest and brush fires tear through parts of Chile forcing residents to evacuate as fire-fighters struggle to contain the blazes that started over the weekend. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....

headline.main: Ravens' Harbaugh, Cowboys' Garrett to Coach Pro Bowl Teams
headline.print_headline: Ravens' Harbaugh, Cowboys' Garrett to Coach Pro Bowl Teams

docs.lead_paragraph: John Harbaugh of the Baltimore Ravens and Jason Garrett of the Dallas Cowboys were named head coaches for the 2015 Pro Bowl, the National Football League said on Tuesday.
docs.snippet: John Harbaugh of the Baltimore Ravens and Jason Garrett of the Dallas Cowboys were named head coaches for the 2015 Pro Bowl, the National Football League said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Feds: Canadian Man Led International Stock Manipulation Scam
headline.print_headline: Feds: Canadian Man Led International Stock Manipulation Scam

docs.lead_paragraph: A Canadian man who bragged about making up to $50 million a month by running an international stock manipulation scheme using a practice known as layering was charged on Tuesday, prosecutors said.
docs.snippet: A Canadian man who bragged about making up to $50 million a month by running an international stock manipulation scheme using a practice known as layering was charged on Tuesday, prosecutors said....

headline.main: Oil Fall Could Lead to Capex Collapse: DoubleLine's Gundlach
headline.print_headline: Oil Fall Could Lead to Capex Collapse: DoubleLine's Gundlach

docs.lead_paragraph: DoubleLine Capital's Jeffrey Gundlach said on Tuesday there is a possibility of a "true collapse" in U.S. capital expenditures and hiring if the price of oil stays at its current level.
docs.snippet: DoubleLine Capital's Jeffrey Gundlach said on Tuesday there is a possibility of a "true collapse" in U.S. capital expenditures and hiring if the price of oil stays at its current level....

headline.main: Goalkeeper Scores in Shootout to Lift West Ham Over Everton in F.A. Cup
headline.print_headline: West Ham Goalkeeper Adrian Beats Everton in FA Cup Shootout

docs.lead_paragraph: After his Everton counterpart, Joel Robles, hit the underside of the crossbar, Adrian scored the decisive penalty kick in a 9-8 shootout win following a 2-2 tie.
docs.snippet: After his Everton counterpart, Joel Robles, hit the underside of the crossbar, Adrian scored the decisive penalty kick in a 9-8 shootout win following a 2-2 tie....

headline.main: Fed's Kocherlakota: Little Chance Global Weakness Will Slow U.S
headline.print_headline: Fed's Kocherlakota: Little Chance Global Weakness Will Slow U.S

docs.lead_paragraph: A top Federal Reserve official said on Tuesday he expects little negative effect on the U.S. economy from global weakness, though the demand for some financial products could come under pressure.
docs.snippet: A top Federal Reserve official said on Tuesday he expects little negative effect on the U.S. economy from global weakness, though the demand for some financial products could come under pressure....

docs.lead_paragraph: After gaining close to 300 pointson the Dow, stocks retreated on Tuesday as oil prices continued to slide. Bobbi Rebell reports.

headline.main: Apple Camera Patent Gives GoPro Stock Jitters
headline.print_headline: Apple Camera Patent Gives GoPro Stock Jitters

docs.lead_paragraph: Apple has patented a new design for a digital video camera that could potentially compete with the rugged portable cameras made by GoPro, a move that sent GoPro's stock tumbling.
docs.snippet: Apple has patented a new design for a digital video camera that could potentially compete with the rugged portable cameras made by GoPro, a move that sent GoPro's stock tumbling....

headline.main: It’s All in the Details at London Men’s Fashion Week

docs.lead_paragraph: At the men’s collections, the details sometimes stole the show, like teddy bear backpacks at Sibling, two-tone flat tops at Man and Lego face masks at Agi & Sam.
docs.snippet: At the men’s collections, the details sometimes stole the show, like teddy bear backpacks at Sibling, two-tone flat tops at Man and Lego face masks at Agi & Sam....
